title: Redesign landing page to match bold purple + iridescent blob hero style

requirements.text: Redesign the Landing page hero section with a solid vivid purple (#7B2FFF or similar) full-viewport background, replacing the current dark/near-black gradient and scroll-driven color transitions.
acceptanceCriteria: The landing page hero viewport fills entirely with a vivid purple background color
The purple background is visible immediately on page load without scrolling
No dark or near-black background is shown on the hero section

requirements.text: Replace the current Web3Blob/ScrollDriven3DScene blob with a large, centrally placed iridescent morphing blob rendered in React Three Fiber. The blob should display vibrant multicolor gradients (pink, teal, yellow, orange) with a glossy/reflective surface, positioned at the center of the hero and rendered on top of the purple background.
acceptanceCriteria: A large 3D morphing blob is centered in the hero section
The blob surface shows iridescent multicolor gradients (pink, teal, yellow, orange tones)
The blob has a glossy, reflective appearance (high specularity/shininess)
The blob continuously animates/morphs without requiring scroll interaction
The blob is rendered over the purple background

requirements.text: Display the app's hero headline text (large, bold, white, sans-serif) centered horizontally across the hero section, overlapping the blob in the z-axis so the blob appears behind or through the text — matching the large typographic treatment in the reference image.
acceptanceCriteria: A large bold white headline is displayed centered in the hero, overlapping the blob visually
The font is a rounded/geometric sans-serif style at a display size (at least 8rem or equivalent)
The text renders above the blob in z-order

requirements.text: Add a minimal top navigation bar with the app name on the left and at least one nav link on the right (e.g., 'About'), styled in white text on the purple background — matching the sparse navigation shown in the reference image.
acceptanceCriteria: A top nav bar is visible on the landing page with brand name on the left
At least one nav link appears on the right side
Nav text is white and background is transparent over the purple hero

requirements.text: Add a circular rotating badge/label element below the blob (similar to the circular text ring reading 'CREATE AND MINT YOUR NFT · DONATE FOR A GOOD CAUSE ·' in the reference), adapted to the app's context (e.g., fitness/fashion tagline), with a small star or sparkle icon at center.
acceptanceCriteria: A circular text badge element is rendered below the blob in the hero
The text rotates slowly as a CSS animation
A small icon (star/sparkle) is centered inside the circular text ring
The element is white/light colored against the purple background

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui/
Keep all existing backend logic unchanged
nonGoals: Changing any backend data models or product logic
Redesigning inner app pages (Shop, TrialHub, Wardrobe, BodyScan)
